plan_context.query: Write a short note on how fast quantum computers currently are. It should be one paragraph and in the style of lecture notes.and write it onto a notion page called quantum

steps.task: Compose a short note on how fast quantum computers are currently operating in one paragraph, following the style of lecture notes. This note should include key points regarding the performance advantages, parallel processing with qubits, and potential future impacts.
Write the composed note from the input onto a Notion page with the name exactly 'quantum'. The note text is provided via the input.

inputs.name: $note_text
inputs.description: The composed lecture note on quantum computer speed.
